content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you having an issue with your HVAC, plumbing, or electrical system?
My AC hasn’t worked right for months and no one ever seems to fix it. What’s the point in trying again?
I'm sorry to hear about your ongoing trouble with the AC. We’d really like to help get this sorted out for you. Could you please tell me your name so I can get your information started?
What’s the point of giving you my name? Last time, you people put it in wrong anyway. Just send someone who knows what they’re doing.

I understand your frustration, and I want to make sure we get it right this time. To send a qualified technician, I’ll need your address to check if you're within our service area. Could you please provide your address?
I’ve given my address a dozen times before. Why can’t you people remember anything? I’m sick of repeating myself.

I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. I do want to help, but without your address, I can't schedule a visit. If you’d prefer speaking to a human, I can get someone from our team to assist you. Would you like that?
No, I don’t want to talk to anyone else. I just want the AC fixed, but I know it won’t get done. Nobody cares about customers these days.
I understand how disappointing this must be. If you decide you’d like to give us another try, we’re ready to help as soon as you can provide your info. Thank you for reaching out.
reason: Customer unwilling to provide required details or proceed to booking.
